comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: Great shot.  I'm just reading a book in which Scottish Regiments account of their time on Walcharen Island is dealt with.  Nice to see an image from that place and time!

comment.author: 95711690@N03
comment._content: Yes, these shots are really quite fascinating.  What's the name of the book?

comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: The book is "With the Jocks" A soldiers struggle for Europe 1944-45 by Peter White.  White was an officer in  the  Kings Own Scottish Borderers or KOSB and they had been trained for mountain warfare!  Thus trained and equipped to fight in the mountains of Europe they were sent to the Netherlands where they don't even have hills:-)  Plus ca change and all that:-)
